subject: Coaches and Managers
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Charlie Manuel, the manager of the Phillies, has been belittled for his ill-fitting uniform, his avuncular nature and his unusual syntax. But he outfoxed everybody this season.
snippet: Charlie Manuel, the manager of the Phillies, has been belittled for his ill-fitting uniform, his avuncular nature and his unusual syntax. But he outfoxed everybody this season.
